question_text:
Question 49 
 
Wet air containing 10 mole percent water vapor is dried by continuously passing it through a column of
2
CaCl
  pellets. The pellets remove 50 percent of water from wet air entering the column. The mole percent
of water vapor in the product stream exiting the column is ___________ (rounded off to two decimal 
places). 
 
 
 
 
[Mass Transfer, 2 Marks]
answer_text:
5.20 to 5.30 
Sol.
